entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:08 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:08 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:08 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
